CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y curl openjdk-8-jdk python &&     echo "deb [arch=amd64] http://storage.googleapis.com/bazel-apt stable jdk1.8" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/bazel.list &&     curl https://bazel.build/bazel-release.pub.gpg | apt-key add - &&     apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y bazel &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
